HotelElement.Name: Lindner Golf & Wellness Resort Portals Nous

Description.Text: Lindner Golf & Wellness Resort Portals Nous is set amid Bendinat's Royal Golf Course and close by the luxury yacht harbour of Puerto Portals. The exceptional african colonial ambience, a wellness, fitness and beauty centre decorated with seaside and african motifs, wonderful, spacious grounds with large sun lawns, a pool with a poolside bar, as well as a separate children's area offer holiday enjoyment for both old and young.

"Relax and enjoy" is the motto at the Lindner Golf & Wellness Resort Portals Nous. And you most certainly will too! Whether on the golf course, in the health and beauty area or simply sunbathing along the poolside!The Lindner Golf & Wellness Resort Portals Nous has a unique location! It offers a calm area with excellent transport facilities: 7 km from Palma city,17 km from Palma airport,3 km to the famous luxury harbour of Puerto Portals, 2 km from the beach.The perfect starting point to begin an excursion to any place on the island.

Standard Room - The CLASSIC CLASS Double Rooms are approx. 30 sqm in size. They have a balcony or terrace with a beautiful view of the golf course.The spacious rooms are equipped with a sofa. The bathrooms are fully equipped and include a bath tub/shower and sinks. Bed size: 1.80 x 2.00 m (Twin 0.90 x 2.00 m) Occupation: max. 2 persons
African Junior Suite - The ROYAL AFRICAN JUNIOR SUITES are approx. 37 sqm in size. They also have a large balcony with deckchairs and view to the pool and garden area or to the golf side. These large rooms are furnished in an detailed African style and include a King Size Bed, as well as a comfortable seating area. The large bathrooms are fully equipped and include a shower. Bed size: 1.80 x 2.10 m Occupation: max. 4 persons
Comfort Room - The COMFORT CLASS rooms are approx. 30 sqm in size. They are located in the main building and have a balcony or terrace with a beautiful view to the pool and garden area. The spacious rooms are equipped with a sofa, a desk and a chair. The bathrooms are fully equipped and include a bath tub/shower and sinks. Bed size 1.80 x 2.00 m (Twin 0.90 x 2.00 m) Occupation: max. 2 persons
First Class Room - Our First Class Double Rooms are approx. 38 sqm in size and have a balcony or terrace facing the golf course. The rooms are equipped with a king size canopy bed and sofa bed and armchair. The large bathrooms are fully equipped and include a bath tub, a separate shower, two sinks and a bidet. Bed size 1.80 x 2.00 m Occupation: max. 3 adults and 1 child
